languages.text: As soon as the Chtonos Pain Engine's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 1/3 for the first time, the Engine gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Devitalisation is reset.
languages.original_text: Как только {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} Орудия Боли Хтонос впервые снизится до 1/3, оно получит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} и обнулит {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}время восстановления{/g} Девитализации.

traits.locale_text: As soon as the Chtonos Pain Engine's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 1/3 for the first time, the Engine gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Devitalisation is reset.

As soon as the Chtonos Pain Engine's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 1/3 for the first time, the Engine gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Devitalisation is reset.

As soon as the Chtonos Pain Engine's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 1/3 for the first time, the Engine gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Devitalisation is reset.

languages.text: Как только {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} Орудия Боли Хтонос впервые снизится до 1/3, оно получит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} и обнулит {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}время восстановления{/g} {g|f:5433e57ba0d04b39a5f5e35cfd02fe86}Devitalisation{/g}.
チャトノス・ペインエンジンの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が初めて1/3に減少すると、エンジンは追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を獲得し、活力低下の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}はリセットされる。
languages.original_text: As soon as the Chtonos Pain Engine's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 1/3 for the first time, the Engine gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Devitalisation is reset.

traits.locale_text: チャトノス・ペインエンジンの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が初めて1/3に減り次第、エンジンは追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を獲得し、活力低下の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}はリセットされる。

languages.text: 当奇托诺斯痛苦引擎的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}首次损失1/3生命值时，奇托诺斯会立刻获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}，活力夺取的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}也会被重置。
languages.original_text: As soon as the Chtonos Pain Engine's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 1/3 for the first time, the Engine gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Devitalisation is reset.

traits.locale_text: 当奇托诺斯痛苦引擎的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}首次损失1/3生命值时，奇托诺斯会立刻获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}，活力夺取的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}也会被重置。

languages.text: En cuanto las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del motor del dolor Chtonos bajan a 1/3 por primera vez, el motor gana un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra y el {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de Desvitalizar se anula.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Chtonos Pain Engine's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 1/3 for the first time, the Engine gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Devitalisation is reset.

traits.locale_text: En cuanto las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del motor del dolor Chtonos bajan a 1/3 por primera vez, el motor gana un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra y el {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de Desvitalizar se anula.

languages.text: Sobald die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} der Chtonos-Schmerzmaschine erstmals auf 1/3 reduziert werden, erhält die Maschine einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} und die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} von Devitalisierung wird zurückgesetzt.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Chtonos Pain Engine's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 1/3 for the first time, the Engine gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Devitalisation is reset.

traits.locale_text: Sobald die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} der Chtonos-Schmerzmaschine zum ersten Mal auf 1/3 reduziert werden, erhält die Maschine einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} und die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} von Devitalisierung wird zurückgesetzt.

Sobald die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} der Chtonos-Schmerzmaschine zum ersten Mal auf 1/3 reduziert werden, erhält die Maschine einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} und die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} von Devitalisierung wird zurückgesetzt.

languages.text: La première fois que la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de la Machine de Tourment Chtonos est réduite de deux tiers, celle-ci bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire et le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de Dévitalisation est réinitialisé.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Chtonos Pain Engine's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 1/3 for the first time, the Engine gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Devitalisation is reset.

traits.locale_text: La première fois que la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de la Machine de Tourment Chtonos est réduite de deux tiers, celle-ci bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire et le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de Dévitalisation est réinitialisé.

La première fois que la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de la Machine de Tourment Chtonos est réduite de deux tiers, celle-ci bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire et le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} de Dévitalisation est réinitialisé.

languages.text: Ktonos Acı Motoru'nun {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı ilk kez 1/3'e düştüğünde Motor, bir ek {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} kazanır ve Cansızlaştırım kabiliyetinin {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresi{/g} sıfırlanır.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Chtonos Pain Engine's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 1/3 for the first time, the Engine gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Devitalisation is reset.
